name: Lego Island 2: The Brickster's Revenge
notes:
Install the game in the default location.
Apply the patches "load screen fix" and "skip intro" in the patcher window.
If after installing the game the graphics are glitched (seethrough hills) you should make sure that you are using a wine version which includes this patch: https://source.winehq.org/git/wine.git/commit/8eab6d45020701b61cf2773305977b7b99b22e73
content:
files:
- patcher:
    filename: LI2.Mod.Manager.V1.2.3.zip
    url: https://github.com/JeffRuLz/LI2-Mod-Manager/releases/download/v1.2.3/LI2.Mod.Manager.V1.2.3.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/LEGO Media/LEGO Island 2/LEGO Island 2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: Setup.exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: directmusic
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: $DISC/Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/LEGO Media/LEGO Island 2/
    file: patcher
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/LEGO Media/LEGO Island 2/LI2ModManager.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1280x1024
  overrides:
    dsound: b
